```{r}
Righthanders <- subset(CHAOSS, subset=Hand=="right")
```

```{r}
str(Righthanders)
```

```{r}
Righthanders <- within(Righthanders, {
  Quick <- Recode(Time, '0:5="1"; 5.01:1000="0"; else="NA"', as.factor=TRUE,
   to.value="=", interval=":", separator=";")
})
```

